data.name: Adult for Clip maker
data.detailed_description:
Adult DLC for Clip Maker contain 18+ age adult characters, dressed in sexy wardrobe (undressable). You can make excellent art images, manga, visual novels, stories, comics, videos, films and clips. Or just have a fun with:

Ava
Joy
Naked Asian
Survivor girl 1*
Survivor girl 2*
Survivor girl 3*
Survivor girl 4*
Survivor girl dirt 1*
Survivor girl dirt 2*
Survivor girl dirt 3*
Survivor girl dirt 4*
School Girl 1
School Girl 2
School Girl 3
School Girl 4
School Girl 5
School Girl Blood
School Girl dirt 1
School Girl dirt 2
School Girl dirt 3
School Girl dirt 4
School Girl dirt 5

*For the following characters you may switch off the head and body.

All characters can be fully undressed and has the intimate body details.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

Please post images or links to your 18+ art in the Discord, because of post public nudity art is not allowed in the discussions on Steam

data.short_description: Adult for Clip maker - get a revolutionary new game and have fun by creating your own 3D video stories, films, clips, art images, manga, visual novels, stories, comics and videos or just have fun with sexy girls.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
